# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an intrinsic content size invalidation structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating the invalidation structure

- **intrinsicContentSize**: The natural size for the receiving view, considering only properties of the view itself.

items.description: The natural size for the receiving view, considering only properties of the view itself.
